metadata.name: useroperinfo
metadata.object: select spindex,ringid,ringname,ringfee,opertime,opertype,operdesc,opermode,opersource,usernumber from $DBALIAS.s50spbuyrings01

metadata.name: userfavorite
metadata.object: select a.ringindex, a.ringid,a.ringlabel, a.ringfee, a.uploadtime, b.singgername,c.spname, a.buytimes, a.largesstimes from $DBALIAS.s50ring a, $DBALIAS.s50singer b ,$DBALIAS.s50spinf c ,$DBALIAS.s50userfavor00 d where d.ringindex=a.ringindex and a.ringtype<2 and a.subindex>4 and a.singerid=b.singerid and a.spindex = c.spindex and a.status = 0

metadata.name: phonegroupinfo
metadata.object: s50callinggroup

metadata.name: userdiscountinfo
metadata.object: select a.discountindex,c.rentfee,c.freerings,c.discountid,c.discountname,c.discountdesc,b.spname from $DBALIAS.s50userdiscount a,$DBALIAS.s50spinf b,$DBALIAS.s50discount c

metadata.name: usergrpinfo
metadata.object: select a.usernumber,b.* from $DBALIAS.s50cardinfo_group a,$DBALIAS.s50groupinf b where a.groupindex= b.groupindex

metadata.name: detailmusicbox
metadata.object: select a.ringgroup,b.grouplabel,a.ringfee,b.buytimes,b.description,b.ringcnt,b.validdate,b.largesstimes,b.spindex from $DBALIAS.s50usersysringgrp a,$DBALIAS.s50sysringgrp b where a.ringgroup=b.ringgroup

metadata.name: promotion_info
metadata.object: select a.ringid,a.ringlabel,a.ringauthor,a.buytimes,a.largesstimes,a.mediatype,a.filetype,a.validdate,a.uploadtime from $DBALIAS.s50ring a,$DBALIAS.s50discountinf b,$DBALIAS.s50product c,$DBALIAS.s50productmem d where 1=1
